author: Ryan Daws
description:
As the AI Energy Council gathers, the question hanging in the air is: how do we power the future without blowing the grid? The massive data centres needed to train and run the latest AI are thirsty for electricity. Data centre power use in the UK is on track to multiply six times over by […]

The post Power play: Can the grid cope with AI’s growing appetite? appeared first on AI News.
title: Power play: Can the grid cope with AI’s growing appetite?

author: Shawna Rowe
description:
The impact of artificial intelligence on society continues to increase, with the technology enhancing and improving the ways in which people go about their daily lives. From carrying out mundane admin tasks to speeding up working processes, the world is more efficient thanks to AI. In recent years, the influence of AI technology has grown. […]

The post Exploring how AI has changed daily life appeared first on AI News.
title: Exploring how AI has changed daily life
